module.name: device_marking
module.keywords: module, marking, configuration management, production, revision, part number, design, manufacture

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of the information needed to apply identification information, using material, to a product for identification of that product. The content of the information is under configuration control. The information provided supports description by a design organization of how, where and using what method to apply the material.

inscope.li: description of how to apply material to an individual product for configuration management identification purposes;
description of how to represent part numbers on a product using applied material;
description of how to represent manufacturer code on a product using applied material;
description of how to represent revision identifier on a product using applied material;
description of how to represent approval date on a product using applied material;
items within the scope of application module Approval, ISO/TS 10303-1012;
items within the scope of application module Characteristic, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1654;
items within the scope of application module Conductivity material aspects, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1756;
items within the scope of application module Part template 2d shape, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1716;
items within the scope of application module Part template 3d shape, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1717;
items within the scope of application module Part template non planar shape, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1719;
items within the scope of application module Person organization, ISO/TS 10303-1011;
items within the scope of application module Physical unit 2d shape, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1726;
items within the scope of application module Physical unit 3d shape, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1727;
items within the scope of application module Product version, ISO/TS 10303-1018;
items within the scope of application module Specification document, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1747;
items within the scope of application module Styled text, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1750.

outscope.li: description of how to represent serial numbers on a product
description of how to represent lot numbers on a product
description of how to represent delivery date on a product

aa.refpath: descriptive_representation_item <= representation_item representation_item.name {(representation_item.name = 'approval date') (representation_item.name = 'manufacturer code') (representation_item.name = 'part number') (representation_item.name = 'revision identifier')}

descriptive_representation_item <= representation_item <- representation.items[i] representation approval_item = representation approval_item <- applied_approval_assignment.items[i] applied_approval_assignment <= approval_assignment approval_assignment.assigned_approval -> approval

descriptive_representation_item <= representation_item <- representation.items[i] representation <- property_definition_representation.used_representation property_definition_representation property_definition_representation.definition -> property_definition property_definition.definition -> characterized_definition characterized_definition = characterized_product_definition characterized_product_definition characterized_product_definition = product_definition product_definition product_definition.formation -> product_definition_formation

descriptive_representation_item <= representation_item <- representation.items[i] representation organization_item = representation organization_item <- applied_organization_assignment.items[i] applied_organization_assignment <= organization_assignment organization_assignment.assigned_organization -> organization

ae.refpath: {[representation representation.name = 'marking'] [representation <- property_definition_representation.used_representation property_definition_representation property_definition_representation.definition -> property_definition property_definition.definition -> characterized_definition characterized_definition = shape_definition shape_definition shape_definition = shape_aspect shape_aspect]}

aa.refpath: representation representation.items[i] -> {representation_item representation_item.name = 'marking location'} representation_item => geometric_representation_item => placement
representation <- representation_relationship.rep_1 {representation_relationship representation_relationship.name = 'marked device shape'} representation_relationship.rep_2 -> representation

representation <- representation_relationship.rep_1 {representation_relationship representation_relationship.name = 'marked device shape'} representation_relationship.rep_2 -> representation => shape_representation

representation <- representation_relationship.rep_1 {representation_relationship representation_relationship.name = 'marked device shape'} representation_relationship.rep_2 -> representation => shape_representation

representation <- representation_relationship.rep_1 {representation_relationship representation_relationship.name = 'marked device shape'} representation_relationship.rep_2 -> representation => shape_representation => manifold_surface_shape_representation

representation <- representation_relationship.rep_1 {representation_relationship representation_relationship.name = 'marked device shape'} representation_relationship.rep_2 -> representation => shape_representation

representation <- representation_relationship.rep_1 {representation_relationship representation_relationship.name = 'marked device shape'} representation_relationship.rep_2 -> representation => shape_representation

representation <- representation_relationship.rep_1 {representation_relationship representation_relationship.name = 'message representation'} representation_relationship.rep_2 -> representation {(representation.id = 'fsd') (representation.id = 'ac2ds') (representation.id = 'ac3ds') (representation.id = 'acnps')}

representation <- representation_relationship.rep_1 {representation_relationship representation_relationship.name = 'message representation'} representation_relationship.rep_2 -> representation {representation.description = 'text representation'} representation.items[i] -> {representation_item representation_item.name = 'marking text'} representation_item => (geometric_representation_item => text_literal) (styled_item => annotation_occurrence => annotation_text_occurrence)
